TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebThreadInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供關於 ASP.NET 處理序中執行緒狀態的資訊。

span.span: Provides information about the state of a thread in an ASP.NET process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 執行個體類別包含使用取得的資訊型別或型別。Instances of the class contain information that is obtained using either the type or the type. 您的應用程式需要存取受保護的資訊，此類型所提供的適當權限。Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂的事件類別的範例，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of creating a custom event class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例有兩個部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一個是可讓 ASP.NET 使用自訂的事件，會使用組態檔的摘錄型別。The first is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event that uses the type. 第二個示範如何實作自訂事件使用型別。The second shows how to implement the custom event that uses the type. 請確定您的自訂事件會引發在適當的時間，也就是會引發取代相等的系統健康狀態事件時。Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation/CS/webthreadinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation/VB/webthreadinformation.vb#1)]

param.name: formatter
param.span: 包含用來將 Web 健康情況事件資訊格式化之定位和縮排設定的 。

span.span: The that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.

summary.span: 格式化執行緒相關的資訊。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供統一的格式如事件資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 它在當提供者會叫用的其中一個會在內部呼叫方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定自訂資訊的格式。The following code example shows how to format custom information. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的帳戶可能任意如果執行緒正在執行以模擬模式。The account returned by this property might be arbitrary if the thread is executing in impersonation mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得執行緒帳戶名稱。The following code example shows how to get the thread account name. summary.span: 取得目前的執行緒識別項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使 managed 的執行緒可能沒有直接對應至 OS 執行緒，以進行偵錯，最好一律以找出特定的執行緒，可能有問題。Even if managed threads might not have direct mapping to the OS threads, for debugging purposes, it is always useful to isolate a specific thread where problems might exist. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得執行緒識別項。The following code example shows how to get the thread identifier. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation/CS/webthreadinformation.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation/VB/webthreadinformation.vb#7)]
